titles.title: To reduce the fiscal year 1996 budget for intelligence activities by $1,000,000,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).

bill.summary: 11/7/1995--Introduced. Reduces by $1 billion the amount authorized to be appropriated during FY 1996 for intelligence activities under the Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1996. Directs the President to identify the accounts and specific programs from which such reductions shall be made.
